function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Wide variation in level of detail provided in adaptation plans","Impact":"Inadequate response to specific needs and vulnerabilities, risk of overlooking key elements in disease prevention and management","Mitigation":"Standardize reporting requirements for adaptation plans, provide guidelines for thorough inclusion of key risk factors and vulnerable groups","Technologies":"Policy frameworks, reporting standards, and guidelines for adaptation planning","People":"Populations vulnerable to vector-borne diseases, including seasonal agricultural workers","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, and international health bodies"},{"Description":"Lack of attention to education and community participation","Impact":"Reduced public awareness and understanding of disease prevention measures, limited community engagement in policy implementation","Mitigation":"Incorporate education and community engagement strategies into adaptation plans, allocate resources for public outreach and participation","Technologies":"Public health education materials, community engagement programs, and participatory decision-making platforms","People":"General population, local communities, and stakeholders in public health","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, community groups"},{"Description":"Failure to specify responsible agencies and mechanisms for collaboration and funding","Impact":"Lack of clear accountability for implementation, potential for fragmented efforts and inadequate resource allocation","Mitigation":"Establish clear lines of responsibility for implementation, develop mechanisms for multi-agency collaboration and funding allocation","Technologies":"Project management tools, collaboration platforms, and funding mechanisms","People":"Government agencies, non-governmental organizations, and international aid organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, intergovernmental agencies, and funding bodies"}]}
